title: Bloomberg Markets: Solender on Impact of Irma on Puerto Rico
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Solender on Impact of Irma on Puerto Rico
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dan Solender Portfolio Manager of Municipal Bonds Lord Abbett & Co Discussing why Puerto Rico may emerge in better shape following Hurricane Irma.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
